verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: signed] [ARG1: a bill] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [C-ARG1: that gives terminally ill patients , their doctors , and pharmaceutical manufacturers the right to try investigational medical treatments when no alternative exists] .
